thread.title: Heather Carlisle

author: Heather Carlisle
title: Heather Carlisle
text: This product is great for beginners as well as small business. It is everything that was promised. I love this product. I will be purchasing the exposure cabinet, very soon. Everything that came in the box worked perfectly, I have never done a screen printing, after watching the enclosed video, all went well, and I had a beautiful product.
